bilingual.source: He is an authority in this field.
She is an authority on this subject.
bilingual.target: 她是这方面的权威奥特。

bilingual.source: She has a lot of authority in the company.
bilingual.target: 她在公司里有很大的权威。

bilingual.source: You should listen to the teacher's authority.
bilingual.target: 你应该听从老师的权威。

bilingual.source: His speech has a high level of authority.
bilingual.target: 他的发言具有很高的权威性。

bilingual.source: He asserts his authority in the classroom.
bilingual.target: 他在课堂上断言自己的权威。

bilingual.source: The government has the authority to enforce laws.
bilingual.target: 政府拥有执行法律的权威。

bilingual.source: Her authority in this field is unmatched.
bilingual.target: 她在这个领域的权威性无人能及。

bilingual.source: The king's signet was a symbol of his authority.
bilingual.target: 国王的印章是他权威的象征。

bilingual.source: She accused him of trying to usurp her authority.
bilingual.target: 她指责他试图篡夺她的权威。

list.abstract: 《Authority》是由歌手《The Church》演唱的一首英文歌曲，收录于1994年5月24日发行的专辑《Sometime Anywhere》中。

yingyinNormal.en: Her presence undermines my authority as Secretary of State.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她的在场会削弱我作为国务卿的权威。

yingyinNormal.en: It undermines my authority. Throws me off balance. Pits me against my rival.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这会削弱我的权威，攻我于不备，挑起对立。

yingyinNormal.en: Trust me, this will be just fine. You are the authority on "just fine."
yingyinNormal.zh: 相信我，这个也挺好。你可是“挺好”的权威代表。

yingyinNormal.en: I mean, she made a total fool of you in front of Breitling, undermined your authority.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她在布赖特林面前那么戏弄你，还挑战你的权威。

yingyinNormal.en: But we must not manufacture our interpretation of the law to erode constitutional authority.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但我们不能随意解释法律来侵蚀宪法赋予的权威。

yingyinNormal.en: It was inspired in part by the work of Kip Thorne, an authority on astrophysics, gravitational waves and the warping of space-time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它的部分灵感来自基普索恩的成就，他是天体物理学、引力波以及时空扭曲理论领域的权威。

yingyinNormal.en: He has a complicated response to authority.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他对官僚的态度很复杂。

yingyinNormal.en: Your husband doesn't have that kind of authority.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你丈夫并没有这种权利。

yingyinNormal.en: I need to speak to someone in position of authority.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要找你们最有份量的人说话。

yingyinNormal.en: And I, Prince, speak with authority from the Walled City.
yingyinNormal.zh: 王子，那我则代表襄阳城全权负责。

yingyinNormal.en: I am his son and heir and I speak with full authority.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是他的儿子，继承人，由我全权负责。

yingyinNormal.en: Aha. You're very lucky there is no one with more authority in this office than me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你很幸运，我就是这间办公室的老大。

yingyinNormal.en: And from whose authority does that flow? The child, the old woman, or the pretender?
yingyinNormal.zh: 谁委托给你这个权利的？小屁孩，老女人，还是冒牌货？

yingyinNormal.en: You have no authority. You are an old woman with a dead husband and no power. You have nothing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你没有这个权力，你不过是个无权无势的老寡妇，你什么都没有。

yingyinNormal.en: Jessie's right. Authority should derive from the consent of the governed, not from the threat of force.
yingyinNormal.zh: 翠丝说的没错，权力应当建立在被统治者的合意之上而不是靠压迫。

yingyinNormal.en: You don't understand. My crown is a symbol of my king-like authority. And between you and me, my hair is thinning a bit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不懂的，我的皇冠代表了我至高无上的权力。在你和我之间，我的头发有点稀疏。

yingyinNormal.en: They've given our troops the authority they need to train Syrian opposition fighters so that they can fight ISIL in Syria.
yingyinNormal.zh: 国会让我们的部队获得授权在叙利亚为反对派提供人员培训，支持他们抗击叙利亚境内的ISIL势力。

yingyinNormal.en: As you might have heard there are Members of Congress who question my authority to make our immigration system work better.
yingyinNormal.zh: 正如你所听到得那样，有国会的议员们质疑我可以让移民体系更好运行，而所使用的权力。

yingyinNormal.en: You had no authority. None. As you know, we're in the middle of the biggest shakeup in the history of British Intelligence.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你无权这么做，没有，如你所知，我们现正面临着英国情报史上最大的动荡。

yingyinNormal.en: But I have authority from the president to share some of the classified brief in order to reinforce the government's argument.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但现在总统授权我公开一些保密文件，旨在使政府的辩词更可信。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: But successive governments have presided over selling green spaces, squeezing money from local <highlight>authorities</highlight> and declining attention on sport in education.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但历届政府都在出售绿地，从地方当局那里榨取资金，并减少对体育教育的关注。

examination_example.sentence: In many cases, it would not be overly burdensome for <highlight>authorities</highlight> to obtain a warrant to search through phone contents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在大多情况下，当局获得搜查电话内容的授权令并不太麻烦。

examination_example.sentence: George Osborne may introduce more flexibility to the current cap on the amount that local <highlight>authorities</highlight> can borrow against their housing stock debt.
examination_example.sentence_trans: George Osborne对地方政府解决房地产股票债务贷款的上限额度采取更加灵活的政策。

sense_info_list.en: the power or right to give orders or make decisions

examination_example.sentence: It needs to give the commission explicit <highlight>authority</highlight> once and for all to bar broadband providers from meddling in the traffic on their network.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它需要一劳永逸地赋予委员会明确的权力，禁止宽带供应商干预其网络流量。

examination_example.sentence: The framers of the Constitution envisioned law as having <highlight>authority</highlight> apart from politics.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 宪法的制定者设想法律具有政治之外的权力。

examination_example.sentence: The Supreme Court has ruled that states do have some regulatory <highlight>authority</highlight> over nuclear power.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最高法院裁定，各州对核能有一定的监管权力。

examination_example.sentence: It turned from God and the <highlight>authority</highlight> of the Roman Catholic Church and instead favored a more humanistic approach to being.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它背离了上帝和罗马天主教会的权威，转而倾向于一种更人道主义的存在方式。

examination_example.sentence: These epochal figures represented lives hard to imitate, but to be acknowledged as possessing higher <highlight>authority</highlight> than mere mortals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些划时代的人物代表着难以模仿的生活，但却被认为比普通人拥有更高的权威。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>authority</highlight> of the NRC will be defied.
examination_example.sentence_trans: NRC的权威将被藐视。

word_usage.usage: authority to do sth.或authority for doing sth.都表示“做某事的权力”。
authority后接on时，表示“在某科或某方面的权威”，如“an authority on history一名历史学的权威专家”。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 管理机构；制定规章的机构；执行机构

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Finally, relevant regulatory <highlight>authorities</highlight> should also strictly monitor the behavior of pop stars and ensure that they set good examples for teenagers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最后，相关监管部门还应严格监控流行音乐歌星的行为，确保他们为青少年树立良好榜样。

examination_example.sentence: France's tax on overnight stays was introduced to assist thermal spa (温泉) towns to develop, and around half of French local <highlight>authorities</highlight> use it today.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 法国对过夜住宿征税是为了帮助温泉城镇得以发展，如今大约有一半的法国地方当局使用它。

examination_example.sentence: Notre Dame Cathedral in the heart of Paris was within "15 to 30 minutes" of complete destruction, French <highlight>authorities</highlight> have revealed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 法国当局透露，巴黎市中心的巴黎圣母院大教堂在“15至30分钟内”被完全摧毁。

sense_info_list.en: the power or right to give orders or make decisions

examination_example.sentence: It is arguable that the country should be regarded as the unit of <highlight>authority</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 国家应被视为权力单位，这是有争议的。

examination_example.sentence: The country, as the unit of <highlight>authority</highlight>, is often a convenient way of generalizing about a population.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 国家作为权力单位，通常是概括人口的一种方便的方法。

examination_example.sentence: However, after a lifetime of moving within the circles of power, he was unable to break with <highlight>authority</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，在权力圈子里生活了一辈子后，他无法与权力分开。

sense_info_list.en: the power to influence others, especially because of one's commanding manner or one's recognized knowledge about something

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Not only will the sunken plane create the perfect skeleton for artificial reef growth, but <highlight>authorities</highlight> hope this new underwater attraction will bring tourists to the area.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这架沉没的飞机不仅将为人工珊瑚礁的形成搭建完美框架，而且当局还希望这个新的水下景点能为该地区带来游客。

examination_example.sentence: Taking a trip underwater and exploring the inside of a sunken A300 would be quite an adventure, and that is exactly what Turkish <highlight>authorities</highlight> are hoping this attraction will make people think.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在水下旅行并探索沉没的 A300 飞机内部将是一次相当大的冒险行动，这正是土耳其当局希望这个景点能让人们想到的。

examination_example.sentence: Turkish <highlight>authorities</highlight> have just sunk something a little different than a ship, and it wouldn't normally ever touch water, an Airbus A300.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 土耳其当局刚刚将某个与船只略有不同的物体沉入海底，这个物体通常不入水——一架空客 A300。

examination_example.sentence: The companies developing self-driving vehicles should be partnering with state and federal <highlight>authorities</highlight> to offer retraining for this massive workforce, many of whom will be displaced by the new technology.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 开发自动驾驶车辆的公司应该与州和联邦当局合作，为这一庞大的劳动力提供再培训，其中，许多人将被新技术取代。

sense_info_list.en: the power or right to give orders or make decisions
a person with extensive or specialized knowledge about a subject

examination_example.sentence: The monstrous pearl, measured at 1 foot wide and 2.2 feet long is going to be verified by local experts and international <highlight>authorities</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这颗巨大的珍珠宽1英尺，长2.2英尺，将由当地专家和国际权威机构进行验证。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a person with extensive or specialized knowledge about a subject

examination_example.sentence: Persons in Asian cultures may view silence as a sign of respect, particularly to an elder or a person in <highlight>authority</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在亚洲文化中，人们可能视沉默为尊重的标志，尤其是对长辈或权威人士。

examination_example.sentence: The environmental challenges are significant but the efforts made by the Tanzania National Park <highlight>Authority</highlight> seem to be paying off .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然说环境挑战任重道远，不过这样看来坦桑尼亚国家公园管理局做出的努力还是初见成效了。

sense_info_list.en: the power or right to give orders or make decisions

examination_example.sentence: Mexicans may use silence when instructions are given by a person in <highlight>authority</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当权威人士给出建议时，墨西哥人可能会保持沉默。
